verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:29
verses.text: Moreover he provided him cities, and possessions of flocks and herds in abundance: for God had given him substance very much.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:30
verses.text: This same Hezekiah also stopped the upper watercourse of Gihon, and brought it straight down to the west side of the city of David. And Hezekiah prospered in all his works.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:31
verses.text: Howbeit in the business of the ambassadors of the princes of Babylon, who sent unto him to enquire of the wonder that was done in the land, God left him, to try him, that he might know all that was in his heart.
